title: Ho Chi Minh City Opulence with Daily Breakfast, Club Lounge Access & Nightly Free-Flow Drinks
description:
Discover a sanctuary of timeless hospitality and five-star elegance in the heart of Ho Chi Minh City. Immerse yourself in the charm of the recently refurbished New World Saigon Hotel, where traditional Vietnamese design is artfully reimagined to create a luxurious and modern escape.

Relish contemporary elegance across six sumptuous restaurants and bars, dishing up a fusion of local and international flavours. Unwind at the serene Coco Spa or relax by the tranquil outdoor pool. For the ultimate indulgence, enjoy exclusive Residence Club Living Room benefits including afternoon tea, all-day refreshments, nightly buffet dinner, nightly cocktails and more.

Perfectly located in District 1, the hotel is surrounded by an array of restaurants, bustling markets and endless entertainment. Whether you’re here to marvel at the city's cultural sites, mouthwatering street food or heritage architecture, Ho Chi Minh City is sure to enthral.
offer_address: 76 Le Lai Street, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City 70000, Vietnam

title: Central Ho Chi Minh City Stay with Lounge Access and Nightly Free-Flow Cocktails
description:
Discover the reunification of old and new culture, beautiful French colonial architecture and exotic street food of Ho Chi Minh City with a stay at the newly refurbished Caravelle Saigon, ideally located within walking distance of some of the city's most iconic sights.

Soak up Ho Chi Minh City's buzzing energy as you enjoy all the modern comforts of a Deluxe Room, with access to the Caravelle Signature Lounge - including daily breakfast, all-day soft drinks and evening cocktails with canapes (5.30pm to 7.30pm) - a glass of Caravelle Terrace Draft beer at the Saigon Saigon Rooftop Bar and a convenient one-way airport transfer.
offer_address: 19-23 Lam Son Square, Bến Nghé, Quận 1, Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam

title: Five-Star Ho Chi Minh City Opulence with Daily Breakfast, Club Access & Massages
description:
Discover an oasis of old-world hospitality and historic elegance at New World Saigon Hotel, a five-star sanctuary in the heart of the dazzling Ho Chi Minh City. Fall in love with the charm and character of the hotel, where traditional Vietnamese design elements have been reimagined into a luxuriously modern escape. This contemporary elegance can be found across its six sumptuous restaurants and bars, blissful Health Club & Spa and tranquil onsite botanic garden.

Enjoy a prime location in the city's District 1, surrounded by restaurants, markets and endless entertainment. Whether you’re in it to pay your respects at the city's many memorials, for the mouthwatering street food, ivory architecture or awe-inspiring views, Ho Chi Minh City will enrapture you with its limitless activities.
offer_address: 76 Le Lai Street, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City 70000, Vietnam

title: Sophisticated Ho Chi Minh City Stay with Rooftop Bar, Daily Breakfast & Executive Lounge Access
description: Immerse yourself in the pulsating ambience of downtown Ho Chi Minh City at Pullman Saigon Centre, a sophisticated stay soaring over the storied streets of Vietnam’s most vibrant city. Enjoy dinner against a glistening cosmopolitan backdrop at Mad Cow Wine & Grill and step out onto the Rooftop Bar for tipples under the night lights. When it comes time to unplug, lose yourself in an indulgent wellness treatment at the onsite spa or head to the rooftop pool for an icy cold drink between laps.
offer_address: 148 Tran Hung Dao Boulevard, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City 700000, Vietnam

title: Ho Chi Minh City Opulence with Daily Breakfast, Club Lounge Access & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Discover an oasis of old-world hospitality and historic five-star elegance in the heart of the dazzling Ho Chi Minh City. Fall in love with the charm and character of New World Saigon Hotel, where traditional Vietnamese design elements have been reimagined into a luxuriously modern escape. This contemporary elegance can be found across the hotel's six sumptuous restaurants and bars - serving a mix of local and international cuisine - the blissful Coco Spa and fitness centre, tranquil outdoor pool and botanic gardens.

Enjoy a prime location in the city's District 1, surrounded by restaurants, markets and endless entertainment. Whether you’re here to marvel at the city's cultural sites, for the mouthwatering street food, ivory architecture or awe-inspiring views, Ho Chi Minh City is sure to enthral.
offer_address: 76 Le Lai Street, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City 70000, Vietnam

title: Sophisticated Ho Chi Minh City Escape with Rooftop Bar, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Free-Flow Drinks Hour
description:
Immerse yourself in the pulsating ambience of downtown Ho Chi Minh City with a stay soaring over the storied streets of Vietnam’s most vibrant city. Delve into the city's rich history and bustling street life with a visit to the famous Ben Thanh Market and the stunning Saigon Opera House, both a short stroll away from your central spot.

Back at your chic city retreat, enjoy dinner against a glistening cosmopolitan backdrop at Mad Cow Wine & Grill and step out onto the Rooftop Bar for tipples under the night lights. When it comes time to unplug, lose yourself in an indulgent wellness treatment at the onsite spa or head to the rooftop pool for an icy cold drink between laps.
offer_address: 148 Tran Hung Dao Boulevard, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City 700000, Vietnam

title: Grand Opening: Sky-High Luxury & Club Access in South East Asia's Tallest Skyscraper
description: Discover the newest addition to Ho Chi Minh City’s luxury hotels: the spectacular Vinpearl Luxury Landmark 81, housed in the tallest skyscraper in South East Asia. Starting from the 47th floor and above, this is the tallest and newest hotel in the country, setting the stage for an unforgettable stay. Experience sky-high luxury, breathtaking panoramic views over the city and outstanding service, all while enjoying exclusive access to the glamorous Pearl Club Lounge - with daily breakfast, evening cocktails and more, plus return airport transfers included.
offer_address: Điện Biên Phủ, Vinhomes Tân Cảng, Hồ Chí Minh, 70000, Vietnam

title: Five-Star Ho Chi Minh City Sofitel Elegance with Daily Breakfast & Club Access
description:
Treat yourself to the world-class service and styling of Sofitel Saigon Plaza, a contemporary Ho Chi Minh City hotel recognised in the top 10% of properties worldwide by Tripadvisor. This five-star, French-inspired escape is tucked away in a quiet enclave on the tree-lined Lê Duẩn Boulevard, just minutes from Notre Dame Cathedral, Independence Palace and the Botanical Garden, putting you in the middle of all the city’s cultural attractions.

Embrace refined elegance from the moment you step into the marble, column-lined lobby. This feeling continues through the contemporary rooms and suites, where the perfect combination of French and Vietnamese design is on full display. This decadent combination can also be found at the five restaurants and bars - experience French dining at LE17 Bistro or watch Asian and French dishes come to life in the open kitchens of Mezz. Float high above the city’s skyline at the rooftop pool terrace, or relax at the RESET Private Wellness Club with a sound bath or infrared sauna.
offer_address: 17 Le Duan Boulevard, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City 700000, Vietnam

title: Central Ho Chi Minh City Stay with VIP Club Access
description: Discover the street-side food stalls, French colonial landmarks and vibrant streets of Ho Chi Minh City with a stay at Sofitel Saigon Plaza. Experience signature Sofitel service with Club access included in your escape. Wake up to daily buffet breakfast in the Club Lounge and enjoy all-day soft drinks, beer and light snacks, evening cocktails with canapés (6pm-8pm), high-speed Wi-Fi and more. Complimentary return airport transfers make getting there a breeze, whether stopping over on a longer trip to Vietnam or enjoying a lengthy stay in buzzing Ho Chi Minh City.
offer_address: 17 Lê Duẩn, Bến Nghé, Quận 1, Hồ Chí Minh 070000, Vietnam

title: Modern Vietnam Apartment Stay with Daily Breakfast and Nightly Dinners
description: Discover the rich history, beautiful colonial architecture and delicious street food of Ho Chi Minh City with a stay at the ultra-stylish SILA Urban Living, ideally located within walking distance of some of the city’s most iconic sights. Spend a few days amid Saigon’s vibrant energy as you enjoy all the modern comforts of a self-contained Deluxe Studio, daily breakfast, nightly set dinner and a convenient one-way airport transfer.
offer_address: 21 Ngô Thời Nhiệm, Phường 6, Quận 3, Hồ Chí Minh 700000, Vietnam

title: Five-Star Ho Chi Minh City Opulence with One-Time Lunch, Club Access & Daily Breakfast
description:
Discover an oasis of old-world hospitality and historic elegance at New World Saigon Hotel, a five-star sanctuary in the heart of the dazzling Ho Chi Minh City. Fall in love with the charm and character of the hotel, where traditional Vietnamese design elements have been reimagined into a luxuriously modern escape. This contemporary elegance can be found across its six sumptuous restaurants and bars, blissful Health Club & Spa and tranquil outdoor pool.

Enjoy a prime location in the city's District 1, surrounded by restaurants, markets and endless entertainment. Whether you’re here to marvel at the city's cultural sites, for the mouthwatering street food, ivory architecture or awe-inspiring views, Ho Chi Minh City is sure to enthrall.
offer_address: 76 Le Lai Street, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City 70000, Vietnam

title: Ho Chi Minh French-Inspired Elegance with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Drinks & Eight-Course Dinner
description:
Indulge in world-class service and French-inspired luxury at this five-star Sofitel haven. Situated on Saigon's tree-lined Le Duan Boulevard - just minutes from iconic landmarks like Notre Dame Cathedral, Independence Palace and the Botanical Garden - the hotel places you right in the heart of Vietnam's largest city.

From the moment you enter the grand marble lobby, you’re welcomed into a world of refined elegance. The hotel’s exceptional dining venues offer something for every taste, including an open kitchen serving up Asian and French masterpieces at breakfast buffet restaurant Mezz, or French delicacies paired with chic interiors at LE17 Bistro.

Drink in breathtaking views of the city skyline from the rooftop pool terrace, sip expertly crafted cocktails at the extravagant Ministry concept bar, or unwind at Bremiere Wellness Center with a treatment for the senses. Stay active with complimentary yoga classes, and relax in the sauna and steam room - every detail is taken care of.
offer_address: 17 Le Duan Boulevard, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City 700000, Vietnam

vendor_name: Hotel Equatorial Ho Chi Minh City (Saigon)
title: Central Ho Chi Minh City Stay with Outdoor Pool, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description: Discover an oasis of old-world hospitality and historic elegance at Equatorial Ho Chi Minh City, a stylish launchpad in vibrant District 5. Fall in love with the charm and character of the hotel, where traditional Vietnamese design elements have been reimagined into a luxuriously modern escape. Nestled amid the bustling streets, enjoy a prime location surrounded by restaurants, markets and endless entertainment, within arm's reach of iconic attractions such as the historic Central Post Office and the stunning Independence Palace. When you're not exploring the city, cool off in the hotel's swimming pool, savour international cuisine across five sumptuous restaurants and bars, or unwind at the blissful Equinox Fitness and Leisure Centre.
offer_address: 242 Tran Binh Trong, District 5, Ho Chi Minh City, 700000, Vietnam

title: Chic Ho Chi Minh City Apartment Escape near Crescent Mall & Convention Centre with Onsite Restaurant & Bar
description:
Step into a world of refined Ho Chi Minh City living at this ideally positioned sanctuary in the dynamic District 7. Perfect for couples or groups, the hotel's studio and apartment-style accommodations make living easy in this prime location, near the SECC Saigon Exhibition and Convention Centre.

Feast on authentic Vietnamese and Asian fusion at the all-day dining Food Exchange and sip on refreshing cocktails at its bar. If you wish to step out, glitzy Crescent Mall is moments away along with the picturesque waterfront promenade, lined with charming cafes and restaurants, offers serene vistas of the Saigon River.
offer_address: No 2 Street C, Tan Phu Ward, District 7, Ho Chi Minh City 700000, Vietnam

title: Sophisticated Ho Chi Minh City Escape in Elegant Ba Son Neighbourhood with Rooftop Pool
description: Immerse yourself in the pulsating heart of Vietnam with a stay at Hotel Indigo Saigon The City, an IHG Hotel, perfectly positioned amid the city's bustling District 1. This vibrant escape is a stone's throw from the city's iconic landmarks, including the Notre-Dame Cathedral Basilica of Saigon and the Central Post Office. Savour authentic Vietnamese cuisine at the hotel's Neighbourhood Cafe, or sip on refreshing cocktails by the rooftop pool, boasting panoramic city views.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Saigon The City, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 9-11 Ly Tu Trong Street, Ho Chi Minh City, 700000, Vietnam

title: Ultra Modern Ho Chi Minh City Escape Near the Airport with Restaurant, Bar & Spa
description: Perfect for passing through, or for a longer break, Parkroyal Saigon is just 10 minutes from the airport and meters from the cultural attractions and culinary delights home to Ho Chi Minh City. Enjoy the warm hospitality Vietnam is famous for while sipping a cocktail poolside, or while indulging in elegant dining at the hotel’s own Garden Brasserie. After days exploring the city, treat yourself to a moment of pure relaxation at the in-house St. Gregory Spa offering a wide range of decadent treatments.
offer_address: 309B-311 Nguyen Van Troi Street, Tan Son Hoa Ward, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam

title: Landmark Five-Star Ho Chi Minh Escape in the Heart of Saigon with Rooftop Bar
description:
Discover the beautiful French architecture and delicious street food of Ho Chi Minh City with a stay at the iconic Caravelle Saigon. Set in pulsing District 1 - also known as Downtown Saigon, an eclectic mix of old-world charm and fast-lane modernity - within walking distance of the city's most iconic sights, Caravelle Saigon offers world-class facilities and the finest comforts in one of the best locations in Ho Chi Minh City.

Originally opened in 1959, this boutique hotel has been at the centre of some of the city's most significant cultural events. Whilst the original building has been lovingly refurbished, its striking French-Vietnamese style survived. Its gracefully curved balconies offer the grandest panoramas of Ho Chi Minh City, while the rooftop bar serves an unbeatable combination of expert cocktails and local brews.
offer_address: 19-23 Lam Son Square, Bến Nghé, Quận 1, Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam

title: Stylish Ho Chi Minh City Break with Rooftop Pool
description: Old-world opulence meets modern five-star elegance at InterContinental Saigon, an IHG Hotel, located in the charming heart of Ho Chi Minh’s historic city centre, just a short wander from some of the city’s most iconic landmarks - including the Reunification Palace and Saigon Opera House. Savour extravagant brunch at Market 39, Peking cuisine at Yu Chu and casual Italian plates at Basilico or head to the rooftop and dive into the stunning outdoor pool with breathtaking views.
offer_address: Corner Hai Ba Trung St.& Le Duan Bl District 1, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam

title: French Colonial Grandeur in Ho Chi Minh City Centre with Award-Winning Dining & Spa
description:
Set beside the Saigon Opera House in the heart of Ho Chi Minh City, this stately hotel pairs French colonial elegance with contemporary sophistication. Inside, days unfold with pastries from The Pastry Boutique, French-Vietnamese at Square One or trattoria-style Italian at Opera, and wind down with cocktails at 2 Lam Son and melt-in-your-mouth treats at Chocolaterie. 

Settle into a sunlounger by the palm-lined outdoor pool or enjoy a deeply restorative treatment inspired by the botanicals of the Mekong Delta at Xuan Spa. Just beyond the hotel, Dong Khoi Street, the Notre Dame Cathedral and the Central Post Office are within walking distance, making this the ideal refined base for discovery in Ho Chi Minh City.
offer_address: 2 Lam Son Square, Ho Chi Minh City, Saigon 700000, Vietnam

title: Exquisite Vietnam Apartments in the Heart of Vibrant Ho Chi Minh City
description: Feel like you're in your home away from home in these fully furnished apartments at InterContinental Saigon Residences, an IHG Hotel, located in the heart of Ho Chi Minh City's District 1. Discover Vietnam's capital city, a vibrant urban metropolis with local delicacies on your doorstep along with heritage buildings within walking distance. Be sure to experience the dynamic nightlife the city is famous for before coming back to find quiet respite in your luxe apartment.
location_description: InterContinental Saigon Residences, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Corner Nguyen Du St. & Le Van Huu Street, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam

title: Signature Luxury in Central Ho Chi Minh with Rooftop Pool, Spa & Onsite Dining
description:
Experience Ho Chi Minh City with a stay a signature Sofitel stay, perfectly positioned in the heart of the city's bustling District 1. This French colonial-style hotel is a stone's throw from the city's most renowned landmarks, including the Saigon Notre-Dame Basilica and the War Remnants Museum. Savour the flavours of Vietnam at Le 17 Bistro, where you can enjoy local dishes with a French twist, or sip on expertly crafted cocktails at the chic Boudoir Lounge.

For a change of pace, take a leisurely stroll along the Saigon River, just minutes from the hotel. After a day of exploration, retreat to the hotel's rooftop pool for a refreshing dip, or rejuvenate your senses at BREMIERE Spa.
offer_address: 17 Le Duan, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City 700000, Vietnam

title: Contemporary Ho Chi Minh City Serviced Studio & Apartment Stay with Outdoor Pool
description:
Experience the vibrancy of Ho Chi Minh City with a contemporary stay in a spacious serviced apartment overlooking the city. Located in the heart of Phu My Hung, District 7, find yourself in close proximity to the Saigon South Place development, including SC Vivocity shopping mall, as well as in easy distance of the CBD.

Enjoy a refreshing cocktail at the Residents' Lounge, or venture out to savour authentic Vietnamese cuisine by exploring the city's thriving street food scene. Return to your home-away-from-home and spend your day lounging by the outdoor pool, or treat the kids to a game or two at the putting range or the playground.
offer_address: 1056A Nguyen Van Linh Boulevard, Tan Phong, District 7, Ho Chi Minh City 700000, Vietnam
